pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods and Tools for Bayesian Dynamic Conditional Correlation GARCH(1,1) Model // Bayesian estimation of dynamic conditional correlation GARCH model for multivariate time series volatility (Fioruci, J.A., Ehlers, R.S. and Andrade-Filho, M.G., (2014). doi:10.1080/02664763.2013.839635.
